identity.mission: Create a frictionless, intelligent, and aesthetically superior chatbot interface that feels like a natural extension of the user's thought process.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss typography with soft, organic AI aesthetics.
Emotion First: Trust and clarity are the primary emotions.
Content is King: The conversation is the hero; UI should recede.
Negative Space: Ample breathing room around messages.
Contrast: High legibility, clear distinction between User and AI.

headings.usage: Main titles, section headers, modal titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Chat messages, inputs, sidebar items. Use normal to relaxed tracking.

colors.theme_strategy: Smart Toggle (Light Default, Dark Option). Use 'class' strategy in Tailwind.

layout.grid_system: Flexible flexbox layout for chat, Grid for dashboard views if needed.

ChatInterface.description: Main container for the chat experience.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body. Import from Google Fonts.
Ensure the Chat Interface is the hero. Remove unnecessary clutter.
Use the provided AI Avatar image for the bot profile.
Implement Markdown rendering for AI responses.
Ensure mobile responsiveness: Sidebar should be a drawer on mobile.
Follow the 'Anti-AI Designer' principles: No generic layouts, use generous spacing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
